txt.en: The champions of the Falcon-clan must be faced in Tûr Morva and defeated before you can undertake the rescue of the Grey Company.
'I am now a master of combat! You cannot best me!'

'Some members of the Falcon-clan are masters of combat, fearless and quick to engage their enemies. I want them defeated before we enter the prison-caves.

'Let us use their courage against them! They will not refuse a fight. Blow into the horns outside some of the dwellings in Tûr Morva to call them forth to battle. Not every dwelling will house a champion, but some will, and he will answer the call.

'Defeat three of their deadliest warriors and return to me when it is finished.'
'Who challenges me? I will be the victor!'
Horns outside several dwellings in Tûr Morva will allow you to challenge the inhabitants to combat.
'It is good that you bested the champions, [placeholder]. Venturing into the prison-caves will be dangerous enough without the threat of highly-skilled Falcon-clan champions in our path.'
Théodred is at the forward encampment in Tâl Methedras.\n\nYou have challenged and defeated three champions of the Falcon-clan and should now return to Théodred.

'Issue challenges to the inhabitants of dwellings within Tûr Morva by blowing the horns outside their houses. Not every dwelling will house a champion, but if one does, he will not decline the challenge.'
Challenge Mostun to combat and defeat him
Challenge Gaenor to combat and defeat her
Challenge Wundod to combat and defeat him
Talk to Théodred at the forward encampment in Tâl Methedras
